name: Eyes (Tangentg)
description:
Remake of the retro arcade maze shooter game "Eyes" in the style of the Atari 7800.

Play as an eye and shoot all the items while avoiding the evil eyes' projectiles. You may shoot evil eyes to temporarily get rid of them. Collision with evil eyes per se is OK, but they will likely shoot when you're close. There are 8 levels and 3 difficulty modes. Extra life every 5000 points.

The "BGM" is randomly generated.

Enter a secret cheat code for a lot more starting lives. (Only up to 6 lives may be visibly shown using this cheat code, to keep with the retro style)

Made in 2016
